content.rendered:
Over 15 years ago, I started my private practice The UltraWellness Center with the intention of creating a place for individuals to come and be seen and heard by world-class practitioners, trained in the practice of Functional Medicine. It has been one of my greatest honors to serve thousands of patients at The UltraWellness Center and to help individuals get to the root cause of their illnesses. This is why I have invited my colleagues at The UltraWellness Center to join me in a special series that I call House Call on my podcast The Doctor’s Farmacy. In these special episodes, my colleagues and I sit down to discuss how we, as Functional medicine practitioners, tackle specific conditions that we see at our practice every single day.

If you’re interested in becoming a patient at The UltraWellness Center, please visit https://ultrawellnesscenter.com/get-started/.

Download episode show notes here:

  • Episode 1: Is An Underactive Thyroid To Blame For Your Mysterious Symptoms? with Dr. Elizabeth Boham
  • Episode 2: What Is Leaky Gut And How Can You Treat It? with Dr. Elizabeth Boham
  • Episode 3: It Is Possible To Stop Or Reverse Dementia with Dr. Elizabeth Boham
  • Episode 4: The Functional Medicine Approach To Cancer and Cancer Recurrence with Dr. Elizabeth Boham
  • Episode 5: The Underlying Causes and Solutions for Women’s Hormonal Balances with Dr. Elizabeth Boham
  • Episode 6: Why Eating Less and Exercising More is a Recipe for Weight Gain with Dr. Elizabeth Boham
  • Episode 7: Why Food Is More Powerful Medicine Than Drugs with Maggie Ward
  • Episode 8: Is Anxiety All In Your Head, Or Is It In Your Body? with Dr. George Papanicolaou
  • Episode 9: The Real Reasons We Have Trouble Sleeping with Dr. Todd LePine
  • Episode 10: Why You Keep getting Sinus Infections, Cold, Urinary Tract Infections, And Other Recurrent Infections with Dr. Elizabeth Boham
  • Episode 11: How To Recover From Chronic Lyme And Tick Diseases with Dr. Todd LePine
  • Episode 12: Treating Acne From The Inside Out with Dr. Elizabeth Boham
  • Episode 13: Prolozone and Nutritional Therapy for Osteoarthritis with Dr. George Papanicolaou
  • Episode 14: Addressing The Underlying Causes Of Infertility with Dr. Elizabeth Boham
  • Episode 15: Treating The Underlying Causes Of High Blood Pressure with Dr. George Papanicolaou
  • Episode 16: Is Brain Fog Caused By Your Microbiome? with Dr. Todd LePine
  • Episode 17: Postmenopausal Hormones: Helpful Or Harmful? with Dr. Elizabeth Boham
  • Episode 18: What Really Causes Autoimmune Disease with Dr. Todd LePine
  • Episode 19: Supplements: Useful Or Useless? with Dr. Elizabeth Boham
  • Episode 20: Male Menopause, Low Libido and Testosterone Replacement
  • Episode 21: Post-COVID Syndrome: A Functional Medicine Approach with Dr. Elizabeth Boham
  • Episode 22: Fixing The Root Causes Of Irritable Bowel Syndrome with Dr. Todd LePine
  • Episode 23: The One Factor That Determines 90% Of Your Risk For Disease with Dr. Todd LePine
  • Episode 24: A Simple Diet Experiment That May Solve Most Of Your Health Issues with Lisa Dreher
  • Episode 25: Getting To The Root Causes Of Why We Are All Tired with Dr. Elizabeth Boham
  • Episode 26: Cholesterol Is Not The Cause Of Heart Disease with Dr. Elizabeth Boham
  • Episode 27: Healing Psoriasis From The Inside Out with Dr. Todd LePine
  • Episode 28: How To Optimize Your Body’s Detoxification System with Maggie Ward
  • Episode 29: Why ADHD Is Not A Psychiatric Disorder Or Brain Disease with Dr. George Papaicolaou
  • Episode 30: Getting To The Root Of Male And Female Hair Loss: A Functional Medicine Approach with Dr. Elizabeth Boham
  • Episode 31: Getting To The Root Of And Getting Rid Of Heartburn And Reflux with Dr. Todd LePine
  • Episode 32: Is Gluten-Free A Fad Or Is Gluten A Real Threat To Our Health? with Maggie Ward
  • Episode 33: Fungus Among Us: Diagnosing And Treating Yeast Problems
  • Episode 34: The Functional Medicine Approach To Ending Migraines
  • Episode 35: Getting Rid of Cold Sores and Canker Sores
  • Episode 36: How To Treat Erectile Dysfunction Without The Little Blue Pill
  • Episode 37: A Functional Medicine Approach To Osteoporosis
  • Episode 38: Wired and Tired: Fixing Adrenal Burnout

Mark Hyman, MD
@graph.description: Mark Hyman, MD is the Founder and Director of The UltraWellness Center, the Head of Strategy and Innovation of Cleveland Clinic's Center for Functional Medicine, and a 13-time New York Times Bestselling author. If you are looking for personalized medical support, we highly recommend contacting Dr. Hyman’s UltraWellness Center in Lenox, Massachusetts today.
